title: Jilted
creator_credit: Bill Bennett, Jenny Day and Mermaid Beach Productions
brief_description: Set around a tropical island resort where Al works trying to escape his past, and where Harriet is running from a failed marriage. Both hurt in the past, they become involved - until disturbed by the arrival of another woman. Cast includes Richard Moir, Jennifer Cluff, Steve Jacobs, Tina Bursill and Helen Mutkins.
